title: PBE air_client won't update
body: I can't get my PBE air_client to update, it's stuck on the 0.0.5.82 release. Any help for this?

replies.body: The PBE client should be using the updated version now, so the air client is no longer available.  Are you getting any error messages?  What are you seeing exactly when trying to update?
nothing, air_client is at the version before the Nightbringer Yasuo and Dawnbringer Riven splashes
I'm still having a little trouble about the issue exactly.  Can you toss me a screenshot so I can take a better look?

this is the current air client folder for me, the last release was 0.0.5.82 and there should be version higher than that
https://puu.sh/wjkw7/510e3131e8.png

Thanks for the screenshot!  For this specific issue, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can work with you directly to figure out what's going on.  We'll see you there!
